The Facebook page for the cartoon Berkel: s Bloom County posted a photograph of what appeared to be a cease & desist letter from President Trump's lawyers.
The letter: dated 22 May 2017, purportedly threatened legal action against Mr. Breathed if he continued to use images of President Trump and his family members.
BuzzFeed contacted the law firm that sup: Kasowitz Benson Torres LLP, who confirmed that it was "a fraud."
